translation.en: Hmm. Honey, nature's happy sauce.
You can drizzle it, you can pour it,
translation.ko: "넷플릭스 시리즈" 조금씩 뿌릴 수도 있고 마음껏 부을 수도 있고

translation.en: you can fill a tiny plastic bear with it and squeeze.
translation.ko: 작은 플라스틱 곰에 가득 채워서 쥐어짤 수도 있어

translation.en: But what's all the buzz about honey?
Yeah, that's what's on the menu today at…
[Waffles and Mochi] ♪ Waffles and Mochi's Restaurant! ♪
-[bell chimes] -Oh, hello. Welcome.
Right this way, please. I've got a wonderful table for you.
I'm Busy, the maître bee. [laughs]
Okay. A menu for you. [buzzes]
And a napkin. Excellent.
Bon appétit. [chuckles, gasps]
No straws?
Drink up!
Would you like that food to go?
Excellent. I'll just take that for you. [mumbles]
There you are. Ah! Enjoy! [buzzes]
Anybody else?
[sighs] I love my job.
That was the busiest our restaurant has ever been.
translation.ko: 우리 식당이 문 연 후로 가장 바쁜 날이었어

translation.en: Hey, friends.
[all] Hey-o, Mrs. O.
What's cookin'?
I'm gonna go get the rest of your delivery.
Thanks so much, Danny.
Mochi, here you go.
Thank you.
What's in the basket, Mrs. O?
Oh, have I got some great stuff for your dinner menu tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 저녁 메뉴로 만들면 좋을 재료를 가져왔단다

translation.en: -Yeah? -Got a little eggplant, some peppers,
-lettuce, and cauliflower. -[Busy gasps]
Did you say cauliflower?
[laughs] Oh, boy.
Ah! Reminds me of when I was just a little bee back on the farm.
translation.ko: 제가 농장에서 살던 꼬마 시절이 생각나네요

translation.en: -They grew cauliflower on the farm? -Oh, yes.
Such wonderful memories of a simpler time. [chuckles]
It looks like you guys were pretty busy at the lunch service today.
translation.ko: 오늘 점심시간에 다들 정신없이 바빴나 보네요

translation.en: -[Waffles] Yeah. -Sure were.
Oh, you should have seen us, Mrs. O.
Mochi, over here, was boiling and frying!
-[Waffles] Yeah. -Waffles was stirring and whisking.
Danny, you were right by our side the whole time.
And, Yuki, you were serving up the customers super fast.
translation.ko: 유키는 눈 깜짝할 속도로 음식을 날랐고요

translation.en: And Bella was announcing every order.
Like this.
I love that sound.
Anyone else who was super helpful?
Oh! I almost forgot. Yes?
-The real hero of the day… -Oh. [chuckles]
…is Steve.
-[splutters] -He cleaned up all that spaghetti.
What? Oh, I was just hungry.
Oh, there's more on my face.
I… I'll be right back.
-[door locks] -He locked himself in the bathroom.
Was it something we said?
I think it was something you didn't say, Waffles.
translation.ko: 네가 말을 안 꺼낸 게 문제 같아, 와플

translation.en: What?
See, everyone was talking about how busy everyone else was
translation.ko: 다들 열심히 일했다며 서로 칭찬해 줬는데

translation.en: except for Busy.
-Oh, no. I feel awful. -[Danny] Oh.
What should we do?
I think you need to apologize and show him how much you appreciate him.
translation.ko: 비지한테 사과하고 고마워하는 마음을 보여 줘야지

translation.en: When I wanna show somebody that I appreciate them,
translation.ko: 난 누군가에게 고마운 마음을 표현할 때

translation.en: I bring them something I know they'll really, really love.
translation.ko: 그 사람이 말할 수 없을 정도로 아주 좋아하는 걸 준단다

translation.en: [gasps] Like puppies?
-Oh, well, we're talking about Busy. -[Waffles] Oh.
-Oh. Honey! -[Mochi] Mm-hmm.
[all] Yeah!
We should cook something with honey for Busy.
I think that would be a lovely idea.
But we don't know anything about honey.
translation.ko: 그런데 우리는 꿀에 대해 아무것도 몰라요

translation.en: Well, the first thing you can do is visit a honey farm.
-That's a great idea! -[meeps]
And I happen to have the card of a great one right here.
translation.ko: 마침 좋은 꿀 농장 명함이 여기 있단다

translation.en: Thank you so much, Mrs. O.
Glad to be of service.
-I will leave you to it. Good luck. -[chuckles]
[all] Thank you.
Bye.
All right, we know what we must do.
To the magic cart!
Our food mission, should we choose to eat it,
learn all about honey, so we can make something super delicious
translation.ko: 꿀에 대해 잘 배우고 맛이 기막힌 음식을 만들어서

translation.en: to cheer up Busy.
Look, there's the honey farm!
-Let's go, Mochi. -[meeps]
-Another perfect landing! -[Mochi meeps in agreement]
Look at this honey farm, Mochi.
translation.ko: 이 꿀 농장 좀 봐, 모찌

translation.en: -There's so many bees here! -[Mochi mimics buzzing]
-Hello. -[beekeepers] Hello.
Hi. Do you know anything about bees?
-Yes. -Yeah, we know a lot about bees.
So get your suits on and come here.
-Okay. Come on, Mochi. Let's go. -[Mochi meeps]
-Hi. -Hello.
Hello. My name is Waffles, and this is my best friend Mochi.
translation.ko: 안녕, 난 와플이고 얘는 내 절친인 모찌야

translation.en: -I’m Gavin. -And I am Grady.
Gavin and Grady. So, where are we?
We’re at Hapa Honey Farm.
Well, we have a little bit of a dilemma.
We wanna cook a meal for our friend Busy.
translation.ko: 비지라는 친구한테 음식을 만들어 줄 건데

translation.en: He’s a bee, so we figured we could cook something with honey.
Could you help us find honey?
-Mm-hmm. We'll help you. -Thank you.
[Gavin] When you puff smoke on the bees, it calms them down.
translation.ko: 이렇게 연기를 쏘면 벌들이 흥분하지 않아

translation.en: So what happens inside of a beehive?
[Gavin] In a beehive, there are three types of bees.
The queen will be inside, um, laying eggs.
-There are drones. -[Grady] The drones have bigger eyes.
translation.ko: 그리고 수벌이 있어 수벌은 눈이 더 커

translation.en: [Gavin] And then the worker bees are out getting pollen and nectar to make honey.
translation.ko: 일벌은 꽃가루와 꽃꿀을 모아서 꿀을 만들고

translation.en: So bees don't just like honey,
translation.ko: 벌은 꿀을 좋아하기만 하는 게 아니라

translation.en: -they make honey? -Yep.
The bees have to work together, and they all have different jobs.
translation.ko: 벌들은 힘을 합쳐서 일해야 하고 각자 하는 일이 다르구나

translation.en: -Just like we do at the restaurant. -[meeps]
[Waffles] So, there’s a queen inside?
[Gavin] Yep, the queen is the big bee who lays all the eggs.
translation.ko: 그래, 여왕벌은 모든 알을 낳는 커다란 벌이야

translation.en: Sounds like a busy job.
And I’m looking for the queen, which I just found.
-The bee with the white dot is the queen. -[Waffles] Hello.
[Grady] My dad marks them with that so we know it's the queen.
translation.ko: 우리가 알아볼 수 있게 아빠가 표시하셨어

translation.en: Hello, Your Majesty.
[Gavin] Okay, Waffles and Mochi, I'm gonna show what the honey looks like.
translation.ko: 와플과 모찌 꿀이 어떻게 생겼는지 보여 줄게

translation.en: -[Waffles] Look, Mochi, that’s honey. -[Mochi meeps]
That’s a good question, Mochi.
How can the bees communicate with each other?
The scout bees go out early to look for all the forage,
translation.ko: 정찰하는 벌들은 아침 일찍 먹이를 찾으러 나가

translation.en: like nectar and pollen.
And they do a little dance in front of the other bees
to tell them where they are.
We love to dance. What kind of dance?
It's called a waggle dance.
♪ A waggle dance A waggle dance ♪
♪ A waggle dance, waggle dance Waga-ga-ga da ♪
So anyways, bees are really hard workers, and they're always busy.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 벌은 열심히 일하고 항상 바빠

translation.en: Bees are responsible for about a third of the food that you put in your mouth.
translation.ko: 우리가 먹는 음식 3분의 1을 벌이 만드는 거야

translation.en: A third of the food that we put in our mouth?
-Yeah. -That's a big part of our restaurant.
Unbelievable!
Wow. It sounds like bees are super important.
translation.ko: 벌은 정말 중요한 일을 하는 것 같은데

translation.en: Why don’t you come to our tasting table to pick out honey for your friend?
translation.ko: 이제 맛을 보고 친구한테 요리해 줄 꿀을 고를래?

translation.en: -Yeah! -[cheers]
Come on, let’s go. Chase me, Mochi!
-Wow, look at all these jars of honey. -[Mochi meeps]
What is honey made from?
Honey, we call it bee barf.
-"Bee barf?" -[meeps]
-So, a bee gets nectar from a flower… -[Waffles] Mm-hmm.
…and then spits it into another bee’s mouth,
translation.ko: 그걸 다른 벌의 입 속에 내뱉어

translation.en: and that bee spits it into another bee's mouth,
translation.ko: 다른 벌은 또 다른 벌의 입 속에 뱉으면서

translation.en: and it continues on for a while.
-[groans] -[Gavin] And it slowly becomes honey,
and they eventually put it into comb.
Depending on where the bees go to forage makes different kinds of honey.
translation.ko: 벌이 먹이를 얻는 곳에 따라서 꿀의 종류가 달라져

translation.en: So if it’s orange blossom honey,
the bees are in a great big field of oranges.
And we have a forest honey,
which is the sap that leaks out of the trees,
and then aphids and other bugs eat the sticky, sweet sap.
translation.ko: 진딧물과 다른 벌레들이 끈적거리는 달콤한 수액을 먹어

translation.en: -They poop out the sugar. -[yelps]
-[man] Yeah. -Is poo-poo honey?
Then the bees take it back to their hive,
and they barf into each other's mouth, and then it becomes forest honey.
translation.ko: 다른 벌의 입 속에 뱉어 그러면 야생숲꿀이 되는 거야

translation.en: [Waffles] But where is your sense of adventure?
I would love to try it. You can.
translation.ko: - 난 어서 맛보고 싶어 - 먹어 봐

translation.en: Hello, honey.
-It's delicious. -[Mochi] Mm.
-Do you like it, Mochi? -Mmm. [meeps]
Forest honey is also one of the most nutritious honey there is.
translation.ko: 야생숲꿀은 영양가가 무척 많은 꿀에 속해

translation.en: Forest honey is even more amazing than regular honey.
translation.ko: 그럼 야생숲꿀은 일반 꿀보다 더 굉장하네

translation.en: Yeah.
I can taste the nutrition.
Or am I tasting the poop?
-Poop. You're tasting the poop. -The nutrition. Nutrition.
Well, we have the honey. But how do we decide what to make with it?
translation.ko: 꿀은 준비됐는데 뭘 만들지 어떻게 정하지?

translation.en: Maybe let’s go talk to a chef.
-A chef. Yeah. -[both laugh]
-[phone rings] -Oh. Sorry, gotta take this.
-[Mochi meeps] -Hello.
How's it going, you two?
Good. We have honey. We're about to talk to a chef.
Great! Things are getting a little better here. Busy stopped crying.
translation.ko: 잘됐네, 여기 분위기도 나아졌어 비지가 울음을 그쳤어

translation.en: [Busy] No. I was just taking a little break!
-You two better hurry. -We will.
Okay, Moch, let's learn how to cook with honey.
translation.ko: 모찌, 꿀로 요리하는 법을 배우러 가자

translation.en: -Are you guys in line for the bathroom? -[Busy gasps] I'm in here, Steven!
translation.ko: 화장실 가려고 줄 섰어요? 내가 화장실 쓰고 있잖아, 스티븐!

translation.en: -Oh. -I'll ju… I'll just use another one.
Hi. Hi.
-How are you? -Hi, guys.
Chef Samin. What are you doing here?
Oh, I'm making a delicious thing called honey confetti.
-Wanna help? Okay. -[Waffles] Yeah!
So, we’re gonna put all sorts of delicious seeds in the honey,
translation.ko: 여러 가지 맛있는 씨앗을 꿀에 넣을 건데

translation.en: and you can drizzle it on top of almost any dish.
translation.ko: 거의 모든 음식에 그걸 뿌려서 먹으면 돼

translation.en: -Will you help mix the seed mixture? -Sure.
translation.ko: 씨앗 섞는 걸 도와줄래? 이건 노란색을 띠는 볶은 참깨란다

translation.en: [Samin] Okay, here’s some toasted yellow sesame seeds.
Here's some toasted pumpkin seeds, toasted poppy seeds.
This is black sesame.
And this is the sunflower. You can add all of those into there.
translation.ko: 해바라기씨도 있어 거기에 다 넣으면 된단다

translation.en: And now, there’s just one ingredient left to add.
translation.ko: 이제 한 가지만 더 넣으면 돼

translation.en: -Honey. -Honey!
Who's gonna help?
-Me. -Me.
-Let’s add this whole jar. -[Grady] Whoa!
[Samin] Now, we’re gonna make our dish.
-These are some sweet potatoes. -[Waffles] Oh, that color.
[Samin] Aren’t they so pretty?
And then we’re gonna do our honey confetti.
-[kids] Mmm! -Confetti, confetti, confetti!
[Samin] And these are marigolds.
Everyone ready to taste some sweet potato?
-Yeah. -Yeah! Okay.
Yes.
Wait a minute. Samin, there's flowers on this.
'Course, there are flowers. They're edible.
The flowers aren't edible.
Some flowers are edible.
We eat flowers all the time.
-Mm? -Things like broccoli.
[screams] Broccoli is a flower?
-Artichokes. -[meeps]
And cauliflower.
Cauliflower is a… flower?
You’re right, Mochi!
Busy said cauliflower was his favorite thing when he was a little bee.
translation.ko: 비지가 어릴 때 콜리플라워를 제일 좋아했다고 했어

translation.en: You can make this dish with cauliflower instead of sweet potatoes.
translation.ko: 이 요리에 고구마 대신 콜리플라워를 넣어도 돼

translation.en: I’m sorry, Samin, we gotta go and get cooking.
Go get cookin'!
Come on, Mochi!
-[all] Bye. -Come on, we gotta go!
-Mochi, are you ready to get cooking? -[meeps excitedly]
All right, time for Waffle speed!
-Aprons on! -[Mochi] Mm-hmm.
-Strings tied! -[Mochi meeps]
-Hats on! Let’s go! -[meeps excitedly]
♪ It’s time to hit the kitchen ♪
♪ And complete our mission ♪
[all] ♪ What’s cookin'? What’s cookin'? ♪
translation.ko: 뭐 할 건데? 뭐 할 건데?

translation.en: ♪ Let’s make a special dish That’s tasty and delish! ♪
translation.ko: 특별 요리를 만들자 기막히게 맛난 음식으로

translation.en: [all] ♪ What’s cookin'? What’s cookin'? ♪
translation.ko: 뭐 할 건데? 뭐 할 건데?

translation.en: -[Mochi flutters lips] Mm? -Hey, Moch. Are you ready to make confetti honey cauliflower?
translation.ko: 모찌, 꿀이랑 콜리플라워로 컨페티를 만들어 볼까?

translation.en: -[meeps] -All right, let's go.
-[all] ♪ One ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Slice a cauliflower ♪
♪ Brush it with oil and roast it ♪
-[all] ♪ Two ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Toast the seeds ♪
-♪ And mix them with honey ♪ -[all] ♪ Three ♪
[Waffles] ♪ Plate it up On a bed of yogurt ♪
-[all] ♪ Four ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Drizzle the honey confetti ♪
♪ And add some flowers ♪
♪ And there you have it, it’s confetti honey cauliflower! ♪
-[all] ♪ Honey cauliflower ♪ -[bell dings]
Order up.
Do… Do you whiff what I whiff?
What is that enchanting smell?
It's this!
What's going on here?
[chuckles] A fresh floral bouquet?
Cooked cauliflower, like, back on the farm?
translation.ko: 이건 내가 농장에서 먹던 콜리플라워 요리네

translation.en: Drizzled with… [gasps] …confetti honey?
I feel so loved.
[screams] It's delicious!
-[all] Hurray! -[Busy laughs]
Today, Mochi and I found out that honey wouldn’t exist without bees.
translation.ko: 오늘 모찌랑 나는 벌이 없으면 꿀도 없다는 걸 배웠어

translation.en: They work so hard making it.
Just like you do here at the restaurant.
Oh, we appreciate you, Busy, and we’re sorry.
translation.ko: 수고해 줘서 고마워, 비지 그리고 미안해

translation.en: That’s the sweetest thing anyone has ever said to me.
And now, I would like to say how much you all mean to me.
translation.ko: 너희 모두 나한테는 둘도 없는 소중한 친구들이야

translation.en: Ooh, Busy’s gonna give us a speech.
No, Danny. Bees communicate through the power of dance.
-Huh? -Hit it!
-[Yuki] Okay. All right. -[Mochi giggles]
Yeah, Busy, okay.
-Shake what your queen gave you. -Yeah!
Come on, shake your stingers, everybody! [grunts]
-[all] Go, Busy. Go, Busy. -That's right. Come on.
-Show me what you got! -[all] Go, Busy!
